text: 28:30 Dɨboboniba 27:21; Godɨn Araziba 33:8; Esra 2:63; Nehemia 7:65Egh dagɨar Godɨn ifongiam gɨfofoghamin kamning isɨ, forivtarir inir an evarimɨn itim darugh, eghtɨ aning an evarim gisɨrara ikiam. Eghtɨ Aron Anogoroghezir Danganimɨn mangɨ, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn tuivsɨ, a dagɨar kamning inigh aning sara mangɨ. Egh Israelia Godɨn ifongiam gɨfoghsɨ, Aron dagɨar kamning uan forivtarir inim darugh, uan evarim gisɨrara aning ater Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn tuivam.”
